message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $12,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but $12,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $6,000. Would you be willing to consider that?
Bob, thanks for your interest.  While I understand your budget constraints, $6,000 is significantly below the value of this product. Could you do $10,000?
I appreciate your understanding of the product's value, but $10,000 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $7,500. Can you consider that?
